subject: Representation of NHAI in the meetings being taken by Hon?ble Minister (RT&H)
text: CJDJJUOJ 999 No. NH-24036/06/2013-H(Pt-Ili) Government of Indla Ministry of Road Transport & Hlahways (Hlghways Section) TRt 1, Sansad Marg, Parivahan Bhavan; New Delhi; dated the April,2013, To, The Chairman National Highways Authority of India , 0-5 & 6, Sector 10, Dwarka; New Delhi - 110075 Subject; Representatlon of NHAI in tho Meetinge belng taken by Kon'ble Minieter (RT&H)-reg: am directed to refer to the subject mentioned above and (o say that it has been noted thiat for tha briefing meeting with the Hon'ble Mlnister (RT&H) on March, 2013, NHAI deputed an officer of the GM level; It has algo been noted; NHAI has not been  following necessary pratocol in the past also and the afficers at the lower level are being deputed to attend the meetings held in the Ministry. Hon'ble Minlster (RTeH) has Iaken tha matter seriously: 2 am also directed t convey tho desire of Hon'ble Minister (RT&H) that in the future meetings to be convened by him, the NHAI should ba represented either by Chairman or the Member concerned, am further directed to request you that the instructions given by the Honble Minister   (RT&H) may please be followad scrupulously.
